topics.body:
Reminder for the day for those of you thinking about making a April fool's prank: in all probability your prank is lame.

On the other hand if you do something like dress as mario and go on the street in a go-cart throwing banana peels on the road that'll be hilarious and you totally should do it; or if mix in hot sauce with ketchup and put it on people's fries and then put hotsauce in their tea telling them it's orange juice and putting superglue on the chair so that they can't get up to get milk you should totally do that.

Other potential pranks: putting laxative in your school/work's tea; putting a cake on a quick-release spring under the plastic plate and when they go to blow out the candle it smashes them in the face; putting a custard pie on top of a doorframe so when they open it they get it in their face; replacing a air freshener with a blowhorn; put a mannequin in a bed next to a sleeping person; wrapping a floppy dildo in toilet paper then put it in a bananapeel and glue the peel back together using liquid stitches; get a sticky sticker of a scratch and put it on their car so it looks like someone keyed it.
